name: Product Analyst
description:
We are looking for a highly motivated Product Analyst who is passionate about experiment design to join OccamFi’s team and possibly lead a team of Product Analysts. Projects will span many analytics initiatives, ranging from in features to product marketing, pricing and more.

The ideal candidate will show a strong grasp of business models and statistics, great analytical and problem-solving skills and the ability to coherently describe complex mathematical concepts to a layman audience.

Primary responsibilities:

  • Be a key driver in bringing innovative ideas to the table that are backed by robust analysis, models and insights,

  • Be able to distill complex models and analysis into compelling insights for our stakeholders and executives,

  • Partner with cross-functional teams and translate business problems into technical requirements,

  • Research competitors and industry related products for new features, user interface or service improvements,

  • Works with products, designers and developers to prepare data for analysis,

  • Lead applied research and build solutions for complex customer centric business problems,

  • Communicate alongside Product Managers and the Board about the product roadmap and key metrics for success,

  • Design and evaluate experiments for new features and launch campaigns,

  • Generate product hypotheses with the team, running tests, analysing the impact of new features on product metrics,

  • Present and report key results around product growth across team and company,

  • Stay up-to-date with tools and methodologies in technology and financial domain,

  • Identify new patterns of user behaviors and detecting anomalies.

Basic Requirements

  • Bachelor's degree in finance, econometrics, economics, mathematics, physics, engineering or similar.

  • 2+ years experience in analysis or modeling of complex processes, including simulation development,

  • Experience in generating hypotheses, testing them, and preparing insights within set deadlines,

  • Advanced knowledge of Python, R, MATLAB, Stata, Julia, or similar and SQL,

  • Ability to demonstrate critical thinking and problem-solving,

  • Ability to formulate data into actionable insights and business decisions,

  • Working proficiency in English,

  • Strong technical and business communication,

  • Knowledge of product metrics, unit economy metrics, users segmentation techniques,

  • Experience in crypto markets is a plus.

Perks and benefits

We are here to work hard and deliver the best products in the space. You will have everything you need to build it with us:

  • Flexible working hours,

  • Solid compensation package,

  • Fully remote work or comfortable office,

  • Fully covered participation in conferences and travel expenses,

  • Occasional team building events,

  • Vacation days are well above the industry average.
